citations.narrative:
***The Records presented for review of animals on hand were incomplete. The acquisition records disclosed where the
sugar gliders came from but not when they were acquired and there were no records of animal births. There were no
disposition records disclosing the complete sales information (name, address, and phone number of the person receiving
the sugar gliders and date of sale), or animal deaths. There was also no documentation for the number of animals
currently on hand. Records disclosing the full information as required in this section, shall be developed, updated, and
maintained on hand for review during inspection.

***A contingency plan has not been developed for the facility. A plan for the management and care of the animals in the
event of an emergency or disaster must be developed, documented and maintained as required in Section 2.134 of the
Animal Welfare Regulations. Correct by March 25, 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Licensee.
Additional Inspectors:
Jeffrey Shepherd, SUPERVISORY ANIMAL CARE SPECIALISTEnd Section

narrative:
2.75(b)  Repeat
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
***The Records presented for review of animals on hand were incomplete.  The acquisition records disclosed where the 
sugar gliders came from but not when they were acquired and there were no records of animal births.  There were no 
disposition records disclosing  the complete sales information (name, address, and phone number of the person receiving 
the sugar gliders and date of sale), or animal deaths.  There was also no documentation for the number of animals 
currently on hand.  Records disclosing the full information as required in this section, shall be developed, updated, and 
maintained on hand for review during inspection. 
2.134 
   
Contingency planning. 
***A contingency plan has not been developed for the facility.  A plan for the management and care of the animals in the 
event of an emergency or disaster must be developed, documented and maintained as required in Section 2.134 of the 
Animal Welfare Regulations.  Correct by March 25, 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Licensee.

Additional Inspectors: 
Jeffrey Shepherd, SUPERVISORY ANIMAL CARE SPECIALISTEnd Section
